mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.starttime AS "start", a.endtime AS "end", a.allday AS "adllDay", a.color AS "color", a.userid AS "user.id", user.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON user.id = a.userid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar( id, title, starttime, endtime, allday, color, userid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{adllDay}, #{color}, #{user.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar SET title = #{title}, starttime = #{start}, endtime = #{end}, allday = #{adllDay}, color = #{color}, userid = #{user.id} WHERE id = #{id}
